TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
It is too much that you get crashed. 

I wish a Jeb. 

Breaking news! New page. 

Edited February 24, 2022 by Abel101126

You always get the new page

Not granted.

Granted: your name is not Grant.

I wish for a world of pure imagination.

Granted, evil people wished very evil stuff and destroyed the world.

I wish to lessen my stress.

Granted: You stop stressing about the stress of being stressed, but I must stress that most things that cause stress will fade naturally with time.

I wish (in other places) that people wouldn't ask me questions on how to do something and then not bother implementing the answers but rather complain that because they put in zero effort, that it doesn't work.

Granted.  Everyone always takes your advice and they always implement your solutions.  Unfortunately, your solutions are always wrong, and people now complain that they followed your advice.

I wish ibwas King Midas, but that I can control when I turn something to gold.

You turn yourself into gold. You died! 

I wish I can have a new page.

You get a new Paige, your girlfriend.

I wish to be happy

You are sad. 

I wish I can have a stronger computer.

Granted.  You CAN have a stronger computer, but you don't.

I wish I was fluent in every known human language, both current and ancient, including all languages that have historically died out.

Granted, but every word you speak is in a different language, making you unable to be understood by anyone.

I wish that the International Space Station could exist for a much longer time than projected.

Granted: They knock it out of orbit and let it drift off into the great void till some gravity well somewhere grabs it.

I wish for an international Moon base.

Tom Cruise hits it to you.

 I wish to receive the RAM this week

Granted: One male sheep.

I wish for some nice food.

Granted, you get an expired ramen noodles.

I wish to finish my video

Granted: It is 1 second long.

I wish for better food than those noodles.

Granted, mango so sour that you can't eat anything for the next 6 hours.

I wish for me to be more active.

Granted: The floor is Lava. Better hop to it.

I wish for really nice dinner type food.

Uncooked meat.

I wish for my wish to be someone's wish
Granted. I wish @Kerbal Productions has no money

I do have money, so wish cursed.

I wish to finish recording clips.

You finished them, but you forgot to save them.

I wish that the next posters wish would not be corrupted.

Granted:

I wish you well.

You fall to a well. Who will rescue you? Your car warranty people?

I wish to not get pricked by a cactus

You fall off a cliff straight into some stinging nettle instead.

I wish for this wish to not be granted.

Edited February 27, 2022 by SkyFall2489
